arts.ttl: Bournemouth’s Antoine Semenyo spot-on to see off Brighton revival
arts.sum: Antoine Semenyo scored one goal and set up the other as Bournemouth beat Brighton 2-1. Alex Scott netted his first league goal since December 2023, with Kaoru Mitoma equalising for the visitors. The Cherries handed a surprise top-flight debut to Veljko Milosavljevic, their 18-year-old transfer deadline day signing, with the centre-back Bafodé Diakité injured. At the other end of the age spectrum, the 39-year-old James Milner replaced Carlos Baleba in Brighton’s starting lineup. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs Brighton: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 4, 2025
arts.sum: The Cherries have got off to another positive start this season, currently sitting in 7th with six points, having most recently defeated Thomas Frank's Tottenham Hotspur . Meanwhile, Adam Webster is a long-term absence for the Seagulls, also recovering from a knee injury.
